channel.title: Call of Duty on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Call of Duty on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Call of Duty’ Coming to Theaters as Paramount, Activision Strike Major Film Deal
item.description: The popular video game franchise will become a live action film through the deal, which Paramount CEO David Ellison calls a “dream come true.”
